mapper.update:
update doc_qc_details set
qclineno=#{qclineno},
linestatus=#{linestatus},
palineno=#{palineno},
customerid=#{customerid},
sku=#{sku},
lotnum=#{lotnum},
paqty_expected=#{paqtyExpected},
qcqty_expected=#{qcqtyExpected},
qcqty_completed=#{qcqtyCompleted},
userdefine1=#{userdefine1},
userdefine2=#{userdefine2},
userdefine3=#{userdefine3},
userdefine4=#{userdefine4},
userdefine5=#{userdefine5},
qcdescr=#{qcdescr},
qcresult=#{qcresult},
filecontent=#{filecontent},
notes=#{notes},
addtime=#{addtime},
addwho=#{addwho},
edittime=#{edittime},
editwho=#{editwho},
packid=#{packid},
transactionid=#{transactionid},
where qcno=#{qcno}
mapper.delete: delete from doc_qc_details where qcno = #{qcno} and qclineno = #{qclineno}
mapper.select: select from doc_qc_details where qcno = #{qcno} and qclineno = #{qclineno}
SELECT count(1) FROM doc_qc_details d LEFT JOIN `doc_qc_header` h ON d.qcno=h.qcno LEFT JOIN `inv_lot_att` a ON d.`lotnum`=a.lotnum
mapper.update: {call spasn_qc_process(#{allqcflag, mode=IN, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{qcno, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qclineno, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qcqty, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lotatt01, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lotatt02, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lotatt06, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lotatt10, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lotatt11, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{lotatt15, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qcdescr, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseid, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{language, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{returncode, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})}

update doc_qc_details set lotnum = #{lotnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qcqty_completed = #{qcqtyCompleted, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userdefine5 = #{userdefine5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linestatus = #{linestatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qcdescr = #{qcdescr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editwho = #{editwho, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edittime = #{edittime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where qcno = #{qcno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qclineno = #{qclineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update doc_qc_details set paqty_expected = #{paqtyExpected, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, qcqty_expected = #{qcqtyExpected, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, qcqty_completed = #{qcqtyCompleted, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, editwho = #{editwho, jdbcType=DOUBLE}, edittime = now() where qcno = #{qcno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qclineno = #{qclineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sum(qcqty_completed) from doc_qc_details where qcno = #{qcno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT ifnull(MAX(QCLINENO + 0),0) FROM doc_qc_details WHERE QCNO = #{qcNo};
